# Vigor, Mass Lesser (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 20 ft.

**Target:** One creature/2 levels, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 10 rounds + 1 round/level (max 25 rounds)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 229

This spell functions like *[[Vigor, Lesser (Spell)|lesser vigor]],* except that it affects multiple creatures.
